about_the_game:
Pack Content
This pack contains useful items to get a head start on a brand new adventure. It includes the following:

• Glittercrystal x 30
Valuable items worth a total of 300,000 rupies when sold.

• 500 MSP
Points used to upgrade characters.

• Fortitude Crystal (S) x 50
Items used to strengthen weapons.

The full game is required to use this content. You may also need to update the game to the newest version.

Downloaded content can be obtained by visiting the Knickknack Shack in game and selecting Claim Add-Ons.
